And I did not believe my eyes. Here, it would seem, there is a beautiful girl, huh? But this was ... it ... Perfection. Yes I Am. Here. Perfection. Such was the feeling that the world around her in black and white and blurred, it is only in one color and sharpness. As she moved! I, too, this had never seen before. I have a lump in my throat already got. Well, she gave this science! What it here in the Zone, do? .. Well, yes, in the Zone. By the evening it was ... at the bus station there nine-private. First, something in the window on the first floor flashed. I 'Kalashnikov. fast with the fuse removed, and then look - out of the door ... I wanted to rub my eyes - you never know what you can expect from the Zone? And it fits. And I'm like a fool, eyes ... machine, however, keep at the ready - a habit already ... Then she noticed me ... smiled ... say hello ... And I listen and hear everything at her watch. It was in blue overalls, so bright ... but not balahonistom and almost fits ... The figure she - something fantastic! It was only then I realized that I do not listen at all, she says - standing and smiling from ear to ear ... It turns out, of the research team was. She asked me if I had the opportunity to help her. Her! Yes, I would anomaly reached for her! .. She said that she is dealing with these, as they are ... endemic zones. Well plants that are found only here. She said that she ran off guard, because with them no freedom of action is not, and has come here alone. I do not know. I believe it. Agreed to help - to drag her something. Two days later came as agreed. Five times almost covered, until collected. Go, but his mind one thought: now I see her again! And nothing. I even at home where it met, did not see. So ... But what she was! She also direct light from the inside ...
Men's loneliness.
